image_assets.prompt: A dynamic, modern tech illustration showing a fragmented digital landscape transforming into a structured, organized framework, with glowing neural network pathways connecting scattered video frames and temporal sequences. Holographic elements depict reinforcement learning feedback loops and multi-modal data streams merging into a cohesive AI model. The scene is set against a dark, futuristic background with vibrant blue and purple light accents, showcasing data visualizations, 3D geometric structures, and abstract representations of video timelines. Style: clean, educational infographic with a cinematic sci-fi aesthetic, high detail, professional digital art.

A modern, technical diagram showing three interconnected pillars rising from a foundation labeled 'Pre-trained Video-LMM', with each pillar representing one post-training method: supervised fine-tuning (showing labeled video frames), reinforcement learning (showing reward signals and policy updates), and test-time scaling (showing dynamic adaptation mechanisms). The diagram should include visual elements representing video understanding challenges like temporal sequences and spatial object tracking.

A modern, technical diagram showing three interconnected pillars rising from a foundation labeled 'Pre-trained Video-LMM', with each pillar representing one post-training method: supervised fine-tuning (showing labeled video frames), reinforcement learning (showing reward signals and policy updates), and test-time scaling (showing dynamic adaptation mechanisms). A modern, abstract visualization showing three interconnected challenges: on the left, a video timeline with highlighted spatial regions showing object detection and temporal progression; in the center, a long video sequence with key frames extracted and connected by flowing lines; on the right, multiple data streams (visual waves, audio waveforms, text blocks) merging into a central processing core, with arrows indicating optimization and enhancement flowing downward into an improved video reasoning engine

A conceptual diagram showing three interconnected pillars rising from a foundation labeled 'Video Foundation Model'. The left pillar represents 'Supervised Fine-Tuning' with visual elements showing a basketball player's shooting sequence breaking down into individual frames with reasoning arrows. The center pillar depicts 'Reinforcement Learning' with reward signals flowing through a neural network architecture, highlighting temporal reward mechanisms. The right pillar illustrates 'Test-Time Scaling' showing multiple video frames being processed simultaneously with enhanced computational resources. All three pillars connect to a unified output structure at the top, with data flow arrows showing their synergistic relationship.
